project_plan.name: Weather Fetcher CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install necessary packages (e.g., requests).
Implement functionality to fetch weather data from a public API.
Parse and extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the API response.
Implement functionality to display the fetched weather information in the terminal.
Write tests to ensure the correctness of the API fetching and data parsing functionalities.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
